stories.Title: When journalism meets AI
stories.Description: OpenAI has secured a licensing agreement with AP, granting them access to a valuable dataset for training its language models. A partnership that fosters responsible and innovative AI development.
stories.Tweet: When journalism meets AI 📦 OpenAI has secured a licensing agreement with AP, granting them access to a valuable dataset for training its language models. A partnership that fosters responsible and innovative AI development. #openai https://apnews.com/article/openai-chatgpt-associated-press-ap-f86f84c5bcc2f3b98074b38521f5f75a

stories.Title: From open-source to commercial
stories.Description: LLaMA, previously available to researchers and academics, is getting a commercial release. Accelerating technological innovation across the AI field for developers and businesses of all sizes.
stories.Tweet: From open-source to commercial 📦 LLaMA, previously available to researchers and academics, is getting a commercial release. Accelerating technological innovation across the AI field for developers and businesses of all sizes. #meta https://www.zdnet.com/article/meta-to-release-open-source-commercial-ai-model-to-compete-with-openai-and-google/

stories.Title: Meta announces CM3leon
stories.Description: This new AI model is here to redefine the text-to-image generation field. With state-of-the-art performance and image captioning capabilities, it leaves its competitors behind.
stories.Tweet: Meta announces CM3leon 📦 This new AI model is here to redefine the text-to-image generation field. With state-of-the-art performance and image captioning capabilities, it leaves its competitors behind. #meta https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/14/meta-generative-transformer-art-model/

stories.Title: Hollywood vs. AI
stories.Description: As the strike for fair treatment and artistic autonomy unfolds in Hollywood. The use of generative AI has become a contentious issue in negotiations between actors and companies in the industry.
stories.Tweet: Hollywood vs. AI 📦 As the strike for fair treatment and artistic autonomy unfolds in Hollywood. The use of generative AI has become a contentious issue in negotiations between actors and companies in the industry. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/13/23794224/sag-aftra-actors-strike-ai-image-rights

stories.Title: Your text is AI generated
stories.Description: AI writing detectors struggle to accurately identify AI-generated text, leading to false positives and confusion. These tools should be used with caution, according to educators.
stories.Tweet: Your text is AI generated 📦 AI writing detectors struggle to accurately identify AI-generated text, leading to false positives and confusion. These tools should be used with caution, according to educators. #ai https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/why-ai-detectors-think-the-us-constitution-was-written-by-ai/

stories.Title: Introducing: Copilot2trip
stories.Description: Experience the perfect blend of AI capabilities and user-friendly design with this innovative travel planning solution.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: Copilot2trip 📦 Experience the perfect blend of AI capabilities and user-friendly design with this innovative travel planning solution. #ai https://www.producthunt.com/posts/copilot2trip

stories.Title: Off to the moon!
stories.Description: Chandrayaan-3 has successfully lifted off, opening new horizons for the nation's space program in their second attempt to soft-land on the moon.
stories.Tweet: Off to the moon! 📦 Chandrayaan-3 has successfully lifted off, opening new horizons for the nation's space program in their second attempt to soft-land on the moon. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/india-launches-chandrayaan-3-lunar-landing-mission/

stories.Title: Rocket Lab's reusability goal
stories.Description: The "Baby Come Back" mission on July 14 brings upgrades to the Electron rocket. By refining the recovery process, the company strives for reusable rocket technology.
stories.Tweet: Rocket Lab's reusability goal 📦 The "Baby Come Back" mission on July 14 brings upgrades to the Electron rocket. By refining the recovery process, the company strives for reusable rocket technology. #rocketlab https://spacenews.com/rocket-lab-takes-another-step-towards-reusability-on-next-electron-launch/

stories.Title: A major setback for JAXA
stories.Description: An unfortunate incident occurred as a rocket being developed by the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency exploded during testing, causing a disruption in their small satellite launch ambitions.
stories.Tweet: A major setback for JAXA 📦 An unfortunate incident occurred as a rocket being developed by the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency exploded during testing, causing a disruption in their small satellite launch ambitions. #rocketscience https://apnews.com/article/japan-explosion-space-rocket-failure-44f195724b33e497fbd053479aa636e9

stories.Title: Virgin Galactic's outer space journey
stories.Description: Following the success of its inaugural commercial spaceflight, the company is gearing up for its first private passenger flight, Galactic 02, on August 10th.
stories.Tweet: Virgin Galactic's outer space journey  📦 Following the success of its inaugural commercial spaceflight, the company is gearing up for its first private passenger flight, Galactic 02, on August 10th. #virgingalactic https://www.engadget.com/virgin-galactics-first-private-passenger-spaceflight-will-launch-as-soon-as-august-10th-151531488.html

stories.Title: Autonomous rides with Volkswagen
stories.Description: With its ID.Buzz electric vans, the company expands autonomous technology testing in Germany and the US, transporting actual passengers for the first time.
stories.Tweet: Autonomous rides with Volkswagen 📦 With its ID.Buzz electric vans, the company expands autonomous technology testing in Germany and the US, transporting actual passengers for the first time. #volkswagen https://electrek.co/2023/07/14/volkswagens-autonomous-id-buzz-evs-to-begin-transporting-passengers-in-germany/

title: AP teams up with OpenAI, LLaMa goes commercial, Meta unveils CM3leon
